Environmental Protection: Children might be more conscious of the environment and implement policies to protect it.
Emphasis on Health and Wellness: Children might prioritize health and wellness, leading to the implementation of policies that promote physical activity and healthy eating habits.
Innovation and Technology: Children might be more open to new ideas and technologies, leading to rapid advancements in various fields.
Peace and Cooperation: Children might prioritize peace and cooperation, leading to the establishment of international organizations focused on conflict resolution and peacekeeping.
Ethical Governance: Children might prioritize ethical governance, leading to the implementation of policies that promote transparency, accountability, and fairness.
